hours_text:
## Plan A Visit

Welcome to the Nasher Sculpture Center – a museum oasis in the heart of downtown Dallas and home to one of the finest collections of modern and contemporary sculpture in the world. 

## 

## Location and Hours

2001 Flora Street, Dallas, TX 75201  
214.242.5100 

Monday – Tuesday , Closed  
Wednesday – Sunday, 11 a.m. – 5 p.m. 

Closed Independence Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day.

[Buy Tickets](https://nashersculpturecenter.ticketing.veevartapp.com/tickets/view/calendar/)

## 

## 

## Admission

Adults: $10  
Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) riders: $8*  
Seniors 65 and over: $7  
Educators with ID: $5  
Students with ID: $5  
Children under 12: FREE  
Military and First Responders with ID: FREE  
SNAP EBT card holders: FREE  
Members: FREE 

[Buy Tickets](https://nashersculpturecenter.ticketing.veevartapp.com/tickets/view/calendar/)

Tickets may be purchased in advance at the link above or upon arrival at the front desk. Admission includes entrance to all interior galleries, sculpture garden, special exhibitions, and cafe.  

[Museum Policies](/policies)  
  
*Valid Proof of Ticket Required.

## 

## Discounts

Admission is FREE for the following public programs:  

Free First Saturdays / Every first Saturday of the month,* 11 a.m. – 5 p.m. Enjoy family programming from 11 a.m. – 2 p.m.

'til Midnight at the Nasher / third Friday of the month, 6 p.m. – midnight, March – October. 

The Nasher is a proud participant in:

accessibility_text:
## Accessibility

The Nasher Sculpture Center strives to be a sensory-friendly environment where all visitors can learn and experience modern and contemporary sculpture. 

## 

## Accessibility at the Nasher

Here are some of the ways in which we hope to accommodate any special needs you might have during your visit at the Nasher: 

  * Wheelchairs
  * Quiet Room
  * Success Story
  * Sensory Kit 
  * Family Activity Kits

[Video: Learn more about accessibility features and resources](https://youtu.be/na3kt1MUmXU)

If you are planning a visit and would like to reserve any of our assistive resources in advance or if you have other questions, please reach out to our Visitor Experiences staff at 214.242.5100 or our Manager of Visitor Experiences via email at [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#2f46434a4a5d405c5c40416f414e5c474a5d5c4c5a435f5b5a5d4a4c4a415b4a5d01405d48)

Service animals are welcome at the Nasher.  

[Learn more about Accessibility Programs at the Nasher.](/programs-events/programs)

## 

## For Visitors with Vision or Hearing Impairments

The Nasher offers several tools that we hope will enhance your visit. 

#### Verbal Descriptions of Artworks

Audio recordings describing the appearance of selected artworks are [available on the Nasher app, powered by Bloomberg Connects.](https://links.bloombergconnects.org/6Ggw/66r9vsw1)

Braille and large print copies of exhibition texts are available for checkout at the Front Desk. Assistive listening devices may ...

## 

## 

[](https://www.nashersculpturecenter.org/art/exhibitions/exhibition/id/2188)

## 

## 

## Plan a Visit

See works by modern and contemporary masters in the Nasher's light-filled galleries and serene outdoor sculpture garden. Learn more about what to expect during your visit. 

[Plan a Visit](/visit/plan-a-vist)

[FREE admission](https://www.nashersculpturecenter.org/programs-events/programs-list/program/id/277) during _Free First Saturdays_ every month! 

## 

[](https://www.nashersculpturecenter.org/art/exhibitions/exhibition/id/2152)

[](https://www.nashersculpturecenter.org/programs-events/nasher-prize/laureates/laureate/id/320)

## Free First Saturdays

Look, learn and love your time at the Nasher every first Saturday of the month. Bring the whole crew to create, discover and make new memories together. Each month features a rotating schedule of things to see and do.

[Learn More](https://www.nashersculpturecenter.org/programs-events/programs-list/program/id/277)

## 

## Read & Watch

Find exclusive content like interviews, audio guides, and insights from curators, educators, and living artists. 

[Learn More](/read-watch)

## 

[](/programs-events/nasher-prize/laureates/laureate/id/320)

## Nasher Prize

Established in 2015, the Nasher Prize is an award dedicated exclusively to excellence in contemporary sculpture. Winners of the Nasher Prize embody the tenets of the award: to recognize a living artist whose body of work has had an extraordinary impact on our...
